home.program_info: IslandPower Configurator is an interactive tool for designing and optimizing off-grid systems. The application guides you through all the steps necessary to create a complete system configuration, including appliances, solar panels, batteries, and controllers. We offer intuitive wizards, visual graphs, and system summaries to make decision-making easier, even for less experienced users. For detailed information on using the application and the configuration steps, download our user manual.
